description:
csv, gob, json, mail, mime, xml: use rune

Nothing terribly interesting here.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM
a little nervous about gob but i've convinced myself nothing else is needed.

LGTM

I only reviewed the CSV part.  I am not enamored with the variable name r1 but nothing much better comes to mind.  I might have chosen c instead (and changed the one instance of c in reader.go to col) but I don't feel that strongly about it.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=a19ec28abad0 ***

csv, gob, json, mail, mime, xml: use rune

Nothing terribly interesting here.

R=golang-dev, r, borman
CC=golang-dev

subject: code review 5315043: csv, gob, json, mail, mime, xml: use rune
